titles.title: To convert a temporary judgeship for the district of Nebraska to a permanent judgeship, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Converts the temporary judgeship for the district of Nebraska to a permanent judgeship.
